thread.section_title: willisorchards.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of willisorchards.com | willisorchards.com | 3 of 257
thread.title: Stephen

author: Stephen
title: Stephen
text:
The website is very easy to find items. Would have liked more individualized info as to what size the items grow so as to know how to distance them.
They were packaged very well, altho Federal Express had them laying down in a small van not tall enough to upright box, even though the boxes said to keep upright.
Ordering was easy and they changed our order upon request without any problem. We had learned after order about needing another pollinator.
Trees are great and sized as ordered, peaches are blooming one week after planting, others leafing also.
